price: (85) And We [i.e., Our angels] are nearer to him than you, but you do not see -
arabic: وَنَحۡنُ أَقۡرَبُ إِلَيۡهِ مِنكُمۡ وَلَٰكِن لَّا تُبۡصِرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wanaḥnu aqrabu ilayhi minkum walākin lā tub'ṣirūna
